item.title: Report E-2024120233
item.description:
Report E-2024120233

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: WESTAMPTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While loading freight into trailer forklift operator did not realize the forkblades on the forklift were sticking out beyond the pallet they were carrying and as a result struck a pail that was already staged in the trailer contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured pail.

item.title: Report E-2024120162
item.description:
Report E-2024120162

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-10T12:24:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-16
  • City: WESTAMPTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer material handler discovered a pail staged on a pallet that had been crushed by top freight consequently crushing the pail and contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the crushed pail.
